description: Generates a formal credit rating write-up including rationale, key factors, and outlook.

parameters.description: The final credit rating assigned (e.g., Pass, Special Mention, Substandard).

parameters.name: rating_outlook
parameters.description: The outlook for the rating (e.g., Stable, Positive, Negative).

parameters.description: A summary of the overall SNC assessment including key findings from non-accrual, repayment, and collateral analysis.

parameters.name: detailed_justification_repayment_capacity
parameters.description: Detailed justification from the repayment capacity assessment.

parameters.name: detailed_justification_collateral_risk

parameters.name: key_financial_metrics_summary

parameters.name: key_qualitative_factors_summary
